fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Drop an anvil on a player's head. Since life is just a cartoon, this won't kill, only severely dazing them. They will be forced to target completely randomly for this night and the next.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- With the Necronomicon, you will instead only force them to target randomly for this night, but also deal a Powerful attack to them.
- Astral
- Your target is only informed that they were redirected.
- If you target a Pokemon with or without the Necronomicon, you will deal an  attack to them.
